description: Mirai is another of the civilians who joins the White Base crew after the attack on Side 7. Her training as a space glider pilot makes her the best choice to take the White Base`s helm, and Mirai soon becomes Bright`s trusted deputy and a surrogate mother to the ship`s young crew. She is also the daughter of a powerful and well-connected family, which causes complications later in the series.
name: Mirai Yashima
